ModMetaData.name: Mashed's Scampuss
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds in the scampuss from Nioh 2, a new furry friend for you to hoard. Scampuss are strange little creatures, and will only appear when someone rings a specially designed bell. They have a high rate of nuzzling, and their presence will occasionally invigorate those nearby.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Based on 'Nioh 2' by Team Ninja.
